extension.name: System - Email Registrants
extension.author: Tuan Pham Ngoc
extension.license: GNU General Public License version 2 or later; see LICENSE.txt
extension.description: This plugin is used to send reminder emails to registrants of your events

field.name: time_to_send
field.label: Number Of Days/Hours
field.description: Enter Number Of Hours/Days (before Event Date) registrants list will be generated and send.

field.name: trigger_code
field.label: Trigger Code (Leave empty unless you are using cron job to send registrants list)
field.description: Enter a secret string here if you want to use cron job to trigger sending registrants. Refer to our documentation for more details

field.name: last_run
field.label: Last Run Time
field.description: Store Last Run Time of the plugin

field.name: time_ranges
field.label: Time Ranges
field.description: If you want to send reminder emails to registrants within certain time ranges, use this parameter. For example, set it to 5,14 will make the system only send email reminder from 5am to 2pm. Set it to 8,10;14:18 will allow sending reminders between 8 to 10 am and 2pm to 6pm.
